title: "Fantaisie Impromptu No. 4 in C#min, Op. 66” by Carlos Hernandez
description:
A reporter travels to Miami to investigate the fringes of science and faith. This story appears in THE ASSIMILATED CUBAN'S GUIDE TO QUANTUM SANTERIA.


This episode is sponsored by The Great Courses (www.thegreatcoursesplus.com/LEVAR) and Google Play (g.co/play/levar).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
